name: Voyage Astral
description:
Voyage Astral offers a visit in the dark but wonderful 9th dimension. Sit back, relax, and let the disembodied green head guide you. There are no interactions to speak of, just generative events and emotions.

This is my #TrainJam2019 contribution, developed solo on the train from Chicago to San Francisco in 48 hours. Made in Unity, modeled in 3dsmax. No plugins used.

Thanks to the TrainJam team, and the Amtrak crew that created the opportunity to have this amazing traveling experience.
